abstract: CVRx raised $65 million in a fourth round of funding as the company is poised to launch a pivotal clinical trial to win approval for the first implantable device for modulating high blood pressure. The deal brings total funding in the six-year-old company to $125 million.
lead_paragraph: CVRx raised $65 million in a fourth round of funding as the company is poised to launch a pivotal clinical trial to win approval for the first implantable device for modulating high blood pressure. The deal brings total funding in the six-year-old company to $125 million.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Leads $65 Million Round for CVRx
